content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""

I then executed the command to read the "river_simulation_output.txt" file. The river is flowing south at a speed of 9 units per second, which I used as a prompt to generate an image that was saved to disk. I executed the command to install eog. I then executed the command to open the generated image file located at /home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/1a92b478-90b1-4aca-a4e7-f8998538016c.jpg, but received an error that no method was available for opening the file.'}
"""
